name: Poco a Poco (klaiis)
description:
Join me, Maestro, the conductor of the world famous frog boy choir, Poco a Poco: “little by little,” we go around town helping sad frogs with our healing music! Can you keep in tune as we save our friends?

Title Screen Cutscene: Frog Choir! Stage One

Controls

Keys- 1, 2, 3

Continue dialogue- Left Mouse button

Pause- ESC

This game made for Global Game Jam 2020!

Code by Inasa Fujio

Art by Gimun Ryu, Sarah Whang & Klaiis

Music by Louie Zong ("Levels" Album)
